name: 区块链安全
desc_en: Articles related to blockchain security, including but not limited to contract security, protocol security, node/client security, exchange security, phishing fraud, etc.
desc_zh: 区块链安全相关的文章，包括但不限于合约安全、协议安全、节点/客户端安全、交易所安全、钓鱼欺诈等。

name: 漏洞利用
desc_en: Special articles on vulnerability exploitation, involving inspiring and innovative vulnerability exploitation techniques.
desc_zh: 漏洞利用专题文章，涉及到富有启发意义的、具有创新性的漏洞利用技术。

name: 供应链安全
desc_en: Security incidents or reports caused by security vulnerabilities in third-party commercial or open-source software/system components.
desc_zh: 由于第三方的商业或开源软件/系统组件存在安全漏洞而导致的安全事件或报告。

name: 浏览器安全
desc_en: Security articles related to mainstream web browsers.
desc_zh: 主流网页浏览器相关的安全文章。

name: 数据泄露
desc_en: Incidents of sensitive information leakage involving individuals, enterprises, or government agencies.
desc_zh: 个人、企业或政府机构的敏感信息泄露事件。

name: CTF夺旗赛
desc_en: CTF problem-solving reports, competition announcements, and standings.
desc_zh: CTF解题报告、比赛通知和赛况等。

name: 内核安全
desc_en: Security technical articles related to the kernels of operating systems such as Linux, Windows, MacOS, iOS, and Android.
desc_zh: Linux、Windows、MacOS、iOS、Android等操作系统内核相关的安全技术文章。

name: 漏洞赏金
desc_en: Bug bounty programs published by software vendors, or experiences written by security researchers on obtaining bounties.
desc_zh: 由软件厂商公布的漏洞赏金计划，或安全研究人员撰写的赏金获取经验。
